title: If the owner of a final plot in the Town Planning Scheme has already accepted or accepts the possess
clause_text: If the owner of a final plot in the Town Planning Scheme has already accepted or accepts the possession of the plot along with encroachments and has developed / develops the remaining vacant plot with full permissible FSI of the entire Final Plot retaining encroachments on his plot, then the slum rehabilitation scheme on encroached plot shall be developed as follows :- The Slum Rehabilitation Scheme shall be entitled for FSI as per these regulations.
section: Slum Rehabilitation Permissible on Town Planning Scheme Plots :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
